data.content_zh_hant_tw: 銅鐘藝術賞是簡靜惠女士為紀念父親簡銅鐘因文學、藝術與電影養分豐富生命而設立，每年捐贈100萬元，2015年開始以文學獎勵傑出文學家，2018年起延伸為藝術賞，延續洪建全文教基金會「播種」精神，由副董事長張淑征負責策劃，以文化創投的前瞻概念出發，遴選一位具獨特視野及國際觀的台灣當代藝術家，基於對藝術家創作理念的信任，在概念階段即給予肯定，並支持其藝術的實踐。
data.content_en_us:
The Tung Chung Art Award was established by Ching-Hui CHIEN in honor of her father, Tung-Chung CHIEN, who
 enriched her life through literature, art, and film. Every year, NT$1 million is set aside for this award, which is
 managed by Grace CHEUNG. One (The awarded) artist with international perspective is chosen based on the
 concept of “cultural venture capital”. Support is provided to the artist during the initial stage of a creative work
 to join forces in the development of Taiwan’s contemporary arts.

data.content_zh_hant_tw: 延續對文化播種與散佈的開創精神，2018年起洪建全基金會作為一個表演與視覺藝術的開放平台，明瞭創作與技術是相輔相成，與台灣松下公司Panasonic共同合作，提供贊助先進的多媒體設備，支持文化藝術發展之運用，鼓勵各類型創作人才及作品讓世界看見。
data.content_en_us: Continuing with the pioneering spirit of cultural sowing and cultivation, creative director Grace Cheung proposed the concept of “Visual Quotient” in hopes to promote the ability to better read our surroundings and images by improving our VQ. Hong’s Foundation started collaborating with Panasonic Taiwan in 2018 to sponsor advanced multimedia equipment for the development of cultural and arts by all types of creative artists for the world to see.

data.content_zh_hant_tw: 覓計畫以一系列的「問題」為年度計劃核心概念。透過一個簡單的問題，探究社會多面向的議題，藉由與你分享一些有趣的人、或者他們曾做過有意思的事，我們希望能夠引導出自己對問題的答案，再用另一個問題持續發酵。
data.content_en_us:
Project Seek asks a series of “questions” as the core concept of the year.
 Through a simple question, we can explore the multi-faceted issues of society. By sharing the interesting people or the interesting things they have done, we hope to guide you to your own answer and then pass another question onto others.

data.content_zh_hant_tw: 無論是進行中或預計發表的創作計畫，每年支持一件具國際發展潛力，且獨樹一格創作特色的當代藝術家，期盼藉由藝術認養的行動，深掘更多台灣藝術創作的爆發能量。
data.content_en_us: The Extension Project will support one piece of creation per year, whether ongoing or projected, by a contemporary artist with unique and creative international growth potential. We can expect to discover even more explosive energy among artistic creation in Taiwan through the extensive actions of the project.

data.content_zh_hant_tw: Project Seek覓計畫尋覓創變基因的觀點，期待激發新的想像力與新體驗。每年對外公開徵選，為藝術家提供一個嶄露頭角的平台，鼓勵各種類型當代藝術文化議題的展演提案，挑戰不同的創作呈現方式，為藝術創作帶來更多的實驗可能性。
data.content_en_us: Project Seek is looking for the idea of innovative and creative genes in hopes to inspire new imagination and new experiences. Every year, it provides an open platform for emerging artists to encourage the proposal and exhibition of various types of contemporary art and cultural discourse. It hopes to challenge different creative presentations and to bring more experimental possibilities to artistic creation.
